description: run PUB for new variable and also overwrites previous value in published variable

processingCommand.script:
!:multiple PUB usage on same variables did not update value but kept 1st one only
!:this task overwrite VAR1, VAR2 and set new VAR3

:SET &VAR1=ccc
:PUB &VAR1
:PRINT &VAR1
:SET &VAR2=ccc
:PUB &VAR2
:PRINT &VAR2
:SET &VAR3=ccc
:PUB &VAR3
:PRINT &VAR3

:IF &VAR1 <> "ccc"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches the value of first variable"
:ENDIF

:IF &VAR2 <> "ccc"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches the value of first variable"
:ENDIF

:IF &VAR3 <> "ccc"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches the value of first variable"
:ENDIF
